Row.Text: Open your borders to them.[n][icon:YIELD_GOLD] +4 per turn.

Do a Research Collaboration with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +8[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn. Other Leader receives +4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +12[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +12 per turn for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +4 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +8 per turn.

Have a Cultural Exchange with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +8[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn. Other Leader receives +4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +12[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +12 per turn for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +4 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +8 per turn.

Have Open Markets with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +8[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn. Other Leader receives +4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +12[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +12 per turn for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +4 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_GOLD] +8 per turn.

Have Local Festivals with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per turn in all Cities. Other Leader receives +4[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +6[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per turn in Cities.
[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] +6 per turn in Cities for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] +4 per turn.[n] [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] +4 per turn in Cities for {1_initialName}.

Share agricultural goods with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in Towns. Other Leader receives +4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +6[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in Towns.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] +6 per turn in Towns for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +4 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_FOOD] +4 per turn in Towns.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +4 per turn.[n]The other Leader has your claimed territory revealed to them over time.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +4 per turn.[n]Other Leader's Units get +2 Combat Strength.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +60.[n]{1_initialName} can start an additional Trade Route with you.

Have Ginseng Agreements with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +6[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in your Cities. Other Leader receives +4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in their Cities.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +10[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in their Cities.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] +10 per turn for both Leaders in their Cities.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] +4 per turn in your Cities.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_FOOD] +6 per turn in their Cities.
Make an ally into a Friend of Wei.[n]Accepted: Both Leaders receive +25%[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science.
Make an ally into a Friend of Wei.[n]Accepted: Both Leaders receive +25%[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +25%.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +25%.
Demand Tribute

Target a Settlement with Treasure Resources. Inflicts -20 [icon:YIELD_GOLD]Gold per turn on the owner of the Settlement for the duration. Creates a Treasure Convoy worth 2 points when the action ends.

Target a Settlement with Treasure Resources. Inflicts -20 [icon:YIELD_GOLD]Gold per turn on the owner of the Settlement for the duration. Creates a Treasure Convoy worth 2 points when the action ends.
You lose 20[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn. They will create a Treaasure Convoy worth 2 points near the targeted settlement when the action ends.
Cancels the Diplomatic Action.
{1_leaderName} is reducing our [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn with the Demand Tribute diplomatic action.
